channel.title: Posts on Sam Metcalfe's Analytics Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Sam Metcalfe's Analytics Blog

item.title: The Search For the Greatest QB Season Ever
item.description: The Buccaneers winning their championship in 2020 all but put away the debate over the greatest quarterback of all time. That has been settled. I found myself asking what the greatest season by an NFL quarterback was. I assembled my list of what I believe to be the top 10 seasons in NFL history. This list was made up of Hall of Famers, Champions, and MVPs. Legends of the sport.

item.title: Introductory Post
item.description: This will be the first viewable post of (hopefully) many on this website. The initial purpose of this blog is to store projects for SPMC 350, Sports Analysis and Visualiztion. My hope is that after a while, this domain will serve as a place for me to store projects and writing, whether for a class or not, to be viewed publically and serve as a portfolio. Please Enjoy!
